title: BRIEF-Pharma Mar Signs New Deal With STA To Commercialize Yondelis In Australia, New Zealand And Southeast Asia
text:
BRIEF-Pharma Mar Signs New Deal With STA To Commercialize Yondelis In Australia, New Zealand And Southeast Asia

Stock Markets 27 minutes ago (Oct 14, 2019 17:10)

© Reuters. BRIEF-Pharma Mar Signs New Deal With STA To Commercialize Yondelis In Australia, New Zealand And Southeast Asia Oct 14 (Reuters) - Pharma Mar SA : * SIGNS A NEW AGREEMENT WITH SPECIALISED THERAPEUTICS ASIA, PTE. LTD (STA) FOR COMMERCIALIZATION OF YONDELIS IN AUSTRALIA, NEW ZEALAND AND SOUTHEAST ASIA * SAYS TO RECEIVE ADVANCE PAYMENT AND MAY RECEIVE ADDITIONAL INCOME, INCLUDING PAYMENTS FOR REGULATORY MILESTONES * TO RETAIN EXCLUSIVE PRODUCTION RIGHTS ON THE PRODUCT AND WILL SELL THE PRODUCT TO STA FOR COMMERCIAL AND CLINICAL USE

BRIEF-Pharma Mar Signs New Deal With STA To Commercialize Yondelis In Australia, New Zealand And Southeast Asia
description: BRIEF-Pharma Mar Signs New Deal With STA To Commercialize Yondelis In Australia, New Zealand And Southeast Asia
